document_data.name: Cascade of Coins
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cascade of Coins''' was the temple of [[Waukeen]] within the third quarter of the city of [[Innarlith]].
document_data.Location: It was located in the third quarter among the tradesmen and workshops.
document_data.Structure: It had a triangular roof supported by eight columns.
document_data.Interior: A deep well was in the middle of the temple that people threw coins down.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]] Senator [[Pristoleph]] married [[Phyrea]], the daughter of Senator [[Inthelph]], at the temple in a simple ceremony without guests.
